General.Name: JPEL Private Equity Ltd
General.Description: JPEL Private Equity Limited is a fund specializing in direct, secondary direct, and fund of funds investments. The fund primarily invests in buyout funds, venture capital funds, and special situation funds. It typically invests throughout the world, with a focus on Europe, North America, and Asia. For its direct investments, the fund prefers to co-invest alongside private equity sponsors.
General.Address: 1345 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY, United States, 10105
